content: f r e e p a t t e r n by angevika crochet pincushion size - approximately 7 5cm/3 inches materials and tools yarn - dk yarn in white and red crochet hook - 2 75/3 00 mm rice or sand fiberfill scissors tapestry needle stitch marker abbreviations us terms single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch blo - back loop only flo - front loop only increase = increase make 2 single_crochet in one stitch decrease = decrease single_crochet 2 stitches together using flo … *6 = repeat whatever is before the * the number of time indicated 12 = number of stitches you should have at the end of the round round 1 = round is indicating the round and then is the corresponding number of each round stem in white yarn round 1 8sc into a magic_ring 8 round 2 increase*8 16 round 3 1sc increase *8 24 round 4 24sc blo round 5 3sc increase *6 30 round 6 4sc increase *6 36 rnds 7-10 36sc 4 row round 11 4sc decrease *6 30 round 12 3sc decrease *6 24 rnds 13-14 24sc 2 row round 15 24sc flo round 16 2sc increase *8 32 fill the stem with rice round 17 3sc increase *8 40 or with sand round 18 4sc increase *8 48 round 19 5sc increase *8 56 rnds 20-21 56sc 2 row fasten_off and leave for now cap in red yarn round 1 8sc into a magic_ring 8 round 2 increase*8 16 round 3 1sc increase *8 24 round 4 2sc increase *8 32 round 5 3sc increase *8 40 round 6 4sc increase *8 48 round 7 5sc increase *8 56 rnds 8-12 56sc 5 row when finish the cap do not cut the yarn take the stem and make 56 slip_stitch all the way around working on both the stem and the cap together when you have around 15 stitches left fill with some fiberfill do not overstuff * to make the white dots on you mushroom make a few french knots enjoy your new pincushion i will be happy to see your finished work - tag @angevikaa or use #angevikacrochet
